docs.title: Model Summary
docs.text: A Natural General Intelligence model specialised in research topics ranging from 3D generation, LLM agents to the broader computer graphics, computer vision and natural language processing fields.Photo stylized by Nano Banana

docs.title: 🎓 Academic Pre-training
docs.text:
• Imperial College London

    • type: MSc in Advanced Computing
    • knowledge cutoff: 2024 - (2025)

  • The University of Edinburgh

    • type: BSc Computer Science, First-class
    • supplementary tasks: Tutoring, Student Representative, Summer Research Internship
    • knowledge cutoff: 2020 - 2024

docs.title: 🖊️ Release History
docs.text:
* denotes equal contribution

ShapeCraft: LLM Agents for Structured, Textured and Interactive 3D Modeling, Shuyuan Zhang*, Chenhan Jiang*, Zuoou Li, and Jiankang Deng, NeurIPS 2025

Towards Unified, Structured and LLM-native 3D Scene Synthesis, MSc Dissertation

Inverse Procedural Modeling: From Sketches to Buildings, BSc Dissertation

docs.title: 🧰 Additional Fine-tuning
docs.text:
• Software Infrastructure for Driverless Vehicle

    • venue: Edinburgh University Formula Students
    • topics: Command Line Interface, Backend
    • knowledge cutoff: 2023 - 2024

  • Assorted Summer Internships

    • topics: Digital Human, LLM Agents, Computer Vision

docs.title: 💻 Example Model Output
docs.text:
Markdown with Variables, custom markdown parser/syntax for inserting variables like Python format strings.

Bigram-based Phrase / Poetic Name Generator and a Stellaris namelist mod, with over 500 subscribers overall.

Distortion Renderer, a custom Blender add-on that distorts an object’s edges and renders with Freestyle to create a sketch-like image, extracted from BSc Dissertation.

PDF Notes Search, PDF and OCR-based notes hierarchical search.
